Summary: Bright Light Changed Colors and Moved
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Chandler
There were no other sightings in Chandler on or around September 2nd 2013
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailsmy husband and i were backing out of our driveway on our way to the park to walk our dog. i happened to look up and observed a bright light hovering over chandler, az over our neigborhood. the light was so bright it looked like i was looking at the light from a welding torch. it first looked like the planet venus, then it got brighter and bigger. i noticed it started to move along a path. i ended up at tumble weed park in chandler and got out of my car. i looked up due north and saw that it had moved and it was now closer to tumble weed park but the elevation was higher. it then hovered for about 5 minutes. then it started to turn orange then in a minute it turned bright red. then, it turned back to the original bright white light and started to ascend up so high that it finaly looked like a very distant star. it vanished right after. i tried to call the chandler municipal airport tower control but i got the recorder stating that they were closed as today is labor day. i called phoenix sky harbor and reported my findings while it was turning orange\red. i saw the same type of sphere\light on sept. 11, 2009 around the same time 7:00-7:40 pm in apache junction. i felt frustrated that i could not videotape the object especially when it changed colors and ascended vanished so quickly.
